title: Collaborative Learning-Based Mathematics Teaching Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and possession of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of asynchronous collaborative activities using digital devices

learning_goals: It can apply three principles and strategies of collaborative learning to actual mathematics classes.
It can design knowledge-construction activities among learners using LMS-based discussion tools (e.g., bulletin boards, wikis).
It can establish an evaluation system for exchanging peer teacher feedback during mathematical problem-solving processes.
It can classify collaborative learning environments based on distributed cognition theory into two types.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
